import React from "react"; import "antd/dist/antd.css"; import { Steps, Popover } from "antd"; const { Step } = Steps; /********************************************** * Deliverable Timeline * ================================== * This would receive an array of deliverables * deliverable is an object that contains * ***********************************************/ const customDot = (dot, { status, index }) => ( step {index} status: {status} } > {dot} ); export default function DeliverableTimeline({ title }) { return (

{title}



); }
